job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: SRE – (Remote) - Up to $200,000 + 10% + Benefits/Shares  One of the market leaders in producing Blockchain software solutions is looking for an SRE with strong skills within a managed production environment, especially with Kubernetes.   The company was set up by the co-founder of Ethereum in 2014 and since then, they have grown to become one of the world's best-recognised Ethereum solutions companies. Located in 30 different countries, open to remote working across the U.S with a great level of engineering.    Key Benefits   100% Remote   Unlimited holidays  Learn about deploying onto Blockchain (Ethereum) infrastructure   Join an industry that is developing every day  Be part of greenfield DevOps Blockchain projects  10% Bonus + Equity    As one of the company’s SRE’s, you will have a great opportunity to make a huge impact on the engineering function of the team, define and manage all aspects of the development and production infrastructure.   Responsibilities:  Continuously improve team’s processes, tools and solutions used to build, deploy, monitor, maintain and scale production systems   Improve the monitoring, alerting and remediation solutions and proactively identify production issues  Lead efforts to remediate critical operational platform issues   Design and improve support processes in collaboration with support and dev teams  Required skills, not limited to:   Linux Engineering   Scripting - Python, Bash, Go   Cloud (AWS/GCP/Azure)  Monitoring – ELK, Prometheus   Infrastructure as Code - Terraform (Preferred)  CI/CD - Jenkins  Kubernetes    Please apply below or contact Emmanuel Oloko at emmanuel@chisquare-analytics.com or call 07546110052 for a confidential chat.
